basic.name: Farewell Hit
basic.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to 50%-130% of Trailblazer 's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: RIP Home Run
skill.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to 62.5%-156.25% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it

ult.name: Stardust Ace
ult.description: Choose between two attack modes to deliver a full strike.Blowout: Farewell Hit deals Physical DMG equal to 300%-525% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.Blowout: RIP Home Run deals Physical DMG equal to 180%-315% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy, and Physical DMG equal to 108%-189% of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

talent.name: Perfect Pickoff
talent.description: Each time after this character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, ATK increases by 10%-25%. This effect stacks up to 2 time(s).

technique.name: Immortal Third Strike
technique.description: Immediately heals all allies for 15% of their respective Max HP after using this Technique.

e1: When enemies are defeated due to the Trailblazer's Ultimate, the Trailblazer additionally regenerates 10 Energy. This effect can only be triggered once per attack.
e2: Attacking an enemy with Physical Weakness restores the Trailblazer's HP equal to 5% of the Trailblazer's ATK.
e3: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
e4: When attacking an enemy with Weakness Break, CRIT Rate is increased by 25%.
e5: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
e6: The Trailblazer's Talent is also triggered when they defeat an enemy.

name: March 7th
description: A girl who once slumbered in eternal ice and knows nothing about her past. To find out the truth about her origins, she decided to travel with the Astral Express. As of right now, she has prepared about 67 different versions of her life story for herself.

basic.name: Frigid Cold Arrow
basic.description: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50%-130% of March 7th's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: The Power of Cuteness
skill.description: Provides a single ally with a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 38%-66.5% of March 7th's DEF plus 190-973.75 for 3 turn(s). If the ally's current HP percentage is 30% or higher, greatly increases the chance of enemies attacking that ally.

ult.name: Glacial Cascade
ult.description: Deals Ice DMG equal to 90%-180% of March 7th's ATK to all enemies. Hit enemies have a 50% base chance to be Frozen for 1 turn(s). While Frozen, enemies cannot take action and will receive Additional Ice DMG equal to 30%-75% of March 7th's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

talent.name: Girl Power
talent.description: After a Shielded ally is attacked by an enemy, March 7th immediately Counters, dealing Ice DMG equal to 50%-125% of her ATK. This effect can be triggered 2 time(s) each turn.

technique.name: Freezing Beauty
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, there is a 100% base chance to Freeze a random enemy for 1 turn(s). While Frozen, the enemy cannot take action and will take Additional Ice DMG equal to 50% of March 7th's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

e1: Every time March 7th's Ultimate Freezes a target, she regenerates 6 Energy.
e2: Upon entering battle, grants a Shield equal to 24% of March 7th's DEF plus 320 to the ally with the lowest HP percentage, lasting for 3 turn(s).
e3: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
e4: The Talent's Counter effect can be triggered 1 more time in each turn. The DMG dealt by Counter increases by an amount that is equal to 30% of March 7th's DEF
e5: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
e6: Allies under the protection of the Shield granted by the Skill restores HP equal to 4% of their Max HP plus 106 at the beginning of each turn.

name: Dan Heng
description: A cold and reserved young man who is reticent about his past. To avoid his kin, he decided to travel with the Astral Express.

basic.name: Cloudlancer Art: North Wind
basic.description: Deals Wind DMG equal to 50%-130% of Dan Heng's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Cloudlancer Art: North Wind
skill.description: Deals Wind DMG equal to 130%-325% of Dan Heng's ATK to a single enemy. On a CRIT Hit, there is a 100% base chance to reduce the target's SPD by 12% for 2 turn(s).

ult.name: Ethereal Dream
ult.description: Deals Wind DMG equal to 240%-480% of Dan Heng's ATK to a single enemy. If the enemy is Slowed, the Ultimate's DMG multiplier increases by 72%-144%.

talent.name: Superiority of Reach
talent.description: When Dan Heng is the target of an ally's Ability, his next attack's Wind RES PEN increases by 18%-45%. This effect can be triggered again after 2 turn(s).

technique.name: Splitting Spearhead
technique.description: After Dan Heng uses his Technique, his ATK increases by 40% at the start of the next battle for 3 turn(s).

name: Himeko
description: The one who repaired the Astral Express. To witness the vast starry sky, she decided to travel with the Astral Express. Her hobby is brewing hand-made coffee.

basic.name: Sawblade Tuning
basic.description: Deals Fire DMG equal to 50%-130% of Himeko's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Molten Detonation
skill.description: Deals Fire DMG equal to 100%-250% of Himeko's ATK to a single enemy and Fire DMG equal to 40%-100% of Himeko's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

ult.name: Heavenly Flare
ult.description: Deals Fire DMG equal to 138%-276% of Himeko's ATK to all enemies. Himeko regenerates 5 extra Energy for each enemy defeated.

talent.name: Victory Rush
talent.description: When an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge (max 3 points).If Himeko is fully Charged when an ally performs an attack, Himeko immediately performs 1 follow-up attack and deals Fire DMG equal to 70%-175% of her ATK to all enemies, consuming all Charge points.At the start of the battle, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge.

technique.name: Incomplete Combustion
technique.description: After using Technique, creates a dimension that lasts for 15 second(s). After entering battle with enemies in the dimension, there is a 100% base chance to increase Fire DMG taken by enemies by 10% for 2 turn(s). Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

name: Welt
description: A seasoned member of the Express Crew. The passion buried in his heart burns anew as he enjoys this fresh adventure. Occasionally, he would sketch the experiences in a notebook.

basic.name: Gravity Suppression
basic.description: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 50%-130% of Welt's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Edge of the Void
skill.description: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 36%-90% of Welt's ATK to a single enemy and further deals DMG 2 extra times, with each time dealing Imaginary DMG equal to 36%-90% of Welt's ATK to a random enemy. On hit, there is a 65%-80% base chance to reduce the enemy's SPD by 10% for 2 turn(s).

ult.name: Synthetic Black Hole
ult.description: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 90%-180% of Welt's ATK to all enemies, with a 100% base chance for enemies hit by this ability to be Imprisoned for 1 turn.Imprisoned enemies have their actions delayed by 32%-44% and SPD reduced by 10%.

talent.name: Time Distortion
talent.description: When hitting an enemy that is already Slowed, Welt deals Additional Imaginary DMG equal to 30%-75% of his ATK to the enemy.

technique.name: Gravitational Imprisonment
technique.description: After using Welt's Technique, create a dimension that lasts for 15 second(s). Enemies in this dimension have their Movement SPD reduced by 50%. After entering battle with enemies in the dimension, there is a 100% base chance to Imprison the enemies for 1 turn.Imprisoned enemies have their actions delayed by 20% and SPD reduced by 10%. Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

name: Arlan
description: The head of Herta Space Station's Security Department. This quiet boy hopes to protect the researchers who value their pursuit of knowledge, and to help them to complete their work.

basic.name: Lightning Rush
basic.description: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50%-130% of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Shackle Breaker
skill.description: Consumes Arlan's HP equal to 15% of his Max HP to deal Lightning DMG equal to 120%-300% of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy. If Arlan does not have sufficient HP, his HP will be reduced to 1 after using his Skill.

ult.name: Frenzied Punishment
ult.description: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 192%-348% of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to 96%-192% of Arlan's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

talent.name: Pain and Anger
talent.description: Increases Arlan's DMG for every percent of HP below his Max HP, up to a max of 36%-90% more DMG.

technique.name: Swift Harvest
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to 80% of Arlan's ATK to all enemies.

name: Asta
description: The lead researcher of Herta Space Station and a lady from a renowned family. She's an astronomer overflowing with curiosity, and excels at managing the disparate staff of the space station.

basic.name: Spectrum Beam
basic.description: Deals Fire DMG equal to 50%-130% of Asta's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Meteor Storm
skill.description: Deals Fire DMG equal to 25%-62.5% of Asta's ATK to a single enemy and further deals DMG for 4 extra times, with each time dealing Fire DMG equal to 25%-62.5% of Asta's ATK to a random enemy.

ult.name: Astral Blessing
ult.description: Increases SPD of all allies by 36-57 for 2 turn(s).

talent.name: Astrometry
talent.description: Gains 1 stack of Charging for every different enemy hit by Asta plus an extra stack if the enemy hit has Fire Weakness.For every stack of Charging Asta has, all allies' ATK increases by 7.0%-17.5%, up to 5 time(s).Starting from her second turn, Asta's Charging stack count is reduced by 3 at the beginning of every turn.

technique.name: Miracle Flash
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Fire DMG equal to 50% of Asta's ATK to all enemies.

name: Herta
description: Member 83 of the Genius Society. The real master of the space station. An incredibly intelligent yet unsympathetic scientist.

basic.name: What Are You Looking At?
basic.description: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50%-130% of Herta's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: One-Time Offer
skill.description: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50%-125% of Herta's ATK to all enemies. If the enemy's HP percentage is 50% or higher, DMG dealt to this target increases by 20%.

ult.name: It's Magic, I Added Some Magic
ult.description: Deals Ice DMG equal to 120%-240% of Herta's ATK to all enemies.

talent.name: Fine, I'll Do It Myself
talent.description: When an ally's attack causes an enemy's HP percentage to fall to 50% or lower, Herta will launch a follow-up attack, dealing Ice DMG equal to 25%-47.5% of Herta's ATK to all enemies.

technique.name: It Can Still Be Optimized
technique.description: After using her Technique, Herta's ATK increases by 40% for 3 turn(s) at the beginning of the next battle.

name: Bronya
description: Heir apparent to the Supreme Guardian of Belobog. She possesses pride befitting of a princess, but also the determination and integrity of a soldier.

basic.name: Windrider Bullet
basic.description: Deals Wind DMG equal to 50%-130% of Bronya's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Combat Redeployment
skill.description: Dispels a debuff from a single ally, allows them to immediately take action, and increases their DMG by 33%-82.5% for 1 turn(s).When this Skill is used on Bronya herself, she cannot immediately take action again.

ult.name: The Belobog March
ult.description: Increases the ATK of all allies by 33%-66%, and increases their CRIT DMG equal to 12%-18% of Bronya's CRIT DMG plus 12%-24% for 2 turn(s).

talent.name: Leading the Way
talent.description: After using her Basic ATK, Bronya's next action will be Advanced Forward by 15%-37.5%.

technique.name: Banner of Command
technique.description: After using Bronya's Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies' ATK increases by 15% for 2 turn(s).

name: Seele
description: A resident of the Underworld and the backbone of Wildfire. She goes by the alias 'Babochka'. She has a frank personality, but there is a delicate and sensitive hidden side to her deep in her heart.

basic.name: Thwack
basic.description: Deals Quantum DMG equal to 50%-130% of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Sheathed Blade
skill.description: Increases Seele's SPD by 25% for 2 turn(s) and deals Quantum DMG equal to 110%-275% of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.

ult.name: Butterfly Flurry
ult.description: Seele enters the buffed state and deals Quantum DMG equal to 255%-510% of her ATK to a single enemy.

talent.name: Resurgence
talent.description: Enters the buffed state upon defeating an enemy with Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, and receives an extra turn. While in the buffed state, the DMG of Seele's attacks increases by 40%-100% for 1 turn(s).Enemies defeated in the extra turn provided by 'Resurgence' will not trigger another 'Resurgence.'

technique.name: Phantom Illusion
technique.description: After using her Technique, Seele gains Stealth for 20 second(s). While Stealth is active, Seele cannot be detected by enemies. And when entering battle by attacking enemies, Seele will immediately enter the buffed state.

name: Serval
description: A Belobog mechanic who used to be a researcher for the Technology Division of the Architects. As Gepard Landau's elder sister, her personality stands in stark contrast to her brother's. She loves an ancient form of music known as 'rock 'n' roll' that was popular before the Eternal Freeze.

basic.name: Roaring Thunderclap
basic.description: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50%-130% of Serval's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Lightning Flash
skill.description: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 70%-175% of Serval's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to 30%-75% of Serval's ATK to enemies adjacent to it, with a 80% base chance for enemies hit to become Shocked for 2 turn(s).While Shocked, enemies take Lightning DoT equal to 40%-130% of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

ult.name: Here Comes the Mechanical Fever
ult.description: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 108%-216% of Serval's ATK to all enemies. Enemies already Shocked will extend the duration of their Shock state by 2 turn(s).

talent.name: Galvanic Chords
talent.description: After Serval attacks, deals Additional Lightning DMG equal to 36%-90% of Serval's ATK to all Shocked enemies.

technique.name: Good Night, Belobog
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to 50% of Serval's ATK to a random enemy, with a 100% base chance for all enemies to become Shocked for 3 turn(s).While Shocked, enemies will take Lightning DoT equal to 50% of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

name: Gepard
description: A captain in the Silvermane Guards and an outstanding warrior of Belobog. He is meticulous and vigilant to the core and is always true to himself.

basic.name: Fist of Conviction
basic.description: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50%-130% of Gepard's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Daunting Smite
skill.description: Deals Ice DMG equal to 100%-250% of Gepard's ATK to a single enemy, with a 65% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn(s).While Frozen, the enemy cannot take action and will take Additional Ice DMG equal to 30%-75% of Gepard's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

ult.name: Enduring Bulwark
ult.description: Applies a Shield to all allies, absorbing DMG equal to 30%-52.5% of Gepard's DEF plus 150-768.75 for 3 turn(s).

talent.name: Unyielding Will
talent.description: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming knocked down, Gepard's HP immediately restores to 25%-62.5% of his Max HP. This effect can only trigger once per battle.

technique.name: Comradery
technique.description: After Gepard uses his Technique, when the next battle begins, a Shield will be applied to all allies, absorbing DMG equal to 24% of Gepard's DEF plus 150 for 2 turn(s).

name: Natasha
description: A doctor from the Underworld and a caregiver of children. Alongside her kindness and caring, she also has a hidden dangerous side.

basic.name: Behind the Kindness
basic.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to 50%-130% of Natasha's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Love, Heal, and Choose
skill.description: Restores a single ally for 7%-12.25% of Natasha's Max HP plus 70-358.75. Restores the ally for another 4.8%-8.4% of Natasha's Max HP plus 48-246 at the beginning of each turn for 2 turn(s).

ult.name: Gift of Rebirth
ult.description: Heals all allies for 9.2%-16.1% of Natasha's Max HP plus 92-471.5.

talent.name: Innervation
talent.description: When healing allies with HP percentage at 30% or lower, increases Natasha's Outgoing Healing by 25%-62.5%. This effect also works on continuous healing.

technique.name: Hypnosis Research
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Physical DMG equal to 80% of Natasha's ATK to a random enemy, with a 100% base chance to Weaken all enemies.While Weakened, enemies deal 30% less DMG to allies for 1 turn(s).

name: Pela
description: A secretarial officer for the Silvermane Guards. She has a serious personality and is revered by other members of the Silvermane Guards.

basic.name: Frost Shot
basic.description: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50%-130% of Pela's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Frostbite
skill.description: Removes 1 buff(s) and deals Ice DMG equal to 105%-262.5% of Pela's ATK as to a single enemy.

ult.name: Zone Suppression
ult.description: Deals Ice DMG equal to 60%-120 of Pela's ATK to all enemies, with a 100% base chance to inflict Exposed on all enemies.When Exposed, enemies' DEF is reduced by 30%-45% for 2 turn(s).

talent.name: Data Collecting
talent.description: If the enemy is debuffed after Pela's attack, Pela will restore 5-12.5 extra Energy. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per attack.

technique.name: Preemptive Strike
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Pela deals Ice DMG equal to 80% of her ATK to a random enemy, with a 100% base chance of lowering the DEF of all enemies by 20% for 2 turn(s).

name: Clara
description: A vagrant girl who lives with robots. She is introverted, gentle, and has a pure heart. She wishes for all Underworlders to become a family.

basic.name: I Want to Help
basic.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to 50%-130% of Clara's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Svarog Watches Over You
skill.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to 60%-150% of Clara's ATK to all enemies, and additionally deals Physical DMG equal to 60%-150% of Clara's ATK to enemies marked by Svarog with a Mark of Counter.All Marks of Counter will be removed after this Skill is used.

ult.name: Promise, Not Command
ult.description: After Clara uses Ultimate, DMG dealt to her is reduced by an extra 15%-30%, and she has greatly increased chances of being attacked by enemies for 2 turn(s).In addition, Svarog's Counter is enhanced. When an ally is attacked, Svarog immediately launches a Counter, and its DMG multiplier against the enemy increases by 96%-192%. Enemies adjacent to it take 50% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. Enhanced Counter(s) can take effect 2 time(s).

talent.name: Because We're Family
talent.description: Under the protection of Svarog, DMG taken by Clara when hit by enemy attacks is reduced by 10%. Svarog will mark enemies who attack Clara with his Mark of Counter and retaliate with a Counter, dealing Physical DMG equal to 80%-200% of Clara's ATK.

technique.name: A Small Price for Victory
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, the chance Clara will be attacked by enemies increases for 2 turn(s).

name: Sampo
description: A merchant who freely travels between the Overworld and the Underworld. He acts like he is everyone's friend, is enthusiastically humorous, and is good at bantering.

basic.name: Dazzling Blades
basic.description: Deals Wind DMG equal to 50%-130% of Sampo's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Ricochet Love
skill.description: Deals Wind DMG equal to 28%-70% of Sampo's ATK to a single enemy, and further deals DMG for 4 extra time(s), with each time dealing Wind DMG equal to 28%-70% of Sampo's ATK to a random enemy.

ult.name: Surprise Present
ult.description: Deals Wind DMG equal to 96%-192% of Sampo's ATK to all enemies, with a 100% base chance to increase the targets' DoT taken by 20%-35% for 2 turn(s).

talent.name: Windtorn Dagger
talent.description: Sampo's attacks have a 65% base chance to inflict Wind Shear for 3 turn(s).Enemies inflicted with Wind Shear will take Wind DoT equal to 20%-65% of Sampo's ATK at the beginning of each turn. Wind Shear can stack up to 5 time(s).

technique.name: Shining Bright
technique.description: After Sampo uses Technique, enemies in a set area are inflicted with Blind for 10 second(s). Blinded enemies cannot detect your team.When initiating combat against a Blinded enemy, there is a 100% fixed chance to delay all enemies' action by 25%.

name: Hook
description: Boss (self-proclaimed) of an Underworld adventure squad, The Moles. She loves freedom and sees life as a series of adventures.

basic.name: Hehe! Don't Get Burned!
basic.description: Deals Fire DMG equal to 50%-130% of Hook's ATK to a target enemy.

skill.name: Hey! Remember Hook?
skill.description: Single Target: Deals Fire DMG equal to 120%-300% of Hook's ATK to a single enemy. In addition, there is a 100% base chance to inflict Burn for 2 turn(s). When afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to 25%-81.25% of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.Blast: Deals Fire DMG equal to 140%-350% of Hook's ATK to a single enemy, with a 100% base chance to Burn them for 2 turn(s). Additionally, deals Fire DMG equal to 40%-100% of Hook's ATK to enemies adjacent to it. When afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to 25%-81.25% of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

ult.name: Boom! Here Comes the Fire!
ult.description: Deals Fire DMG equal to 240%-480% of Hook's ATK to a single enemy. After using Ultimate, the next Skill to be used is Enhanced, which deals DMG to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.

talent.name: Ha! Oil to the Flames!
talent.description: When attacking a target afflicted with Burn, deals Additional Fire DMG equal to 50%-125% of Hook's ATK and regenerates 5 extra Energy.

technique.name: Ack! Look at This Mess!
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Hook deals Fire DMG equal to 50% of her ATK to a random enemy. In addition, there is a 100% base chance to inflict Burn on every enemy for 3 turn(s). When afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to 50% of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

name: Qingque
description: Diviner of the Divination Commission on the Xianzhou Luofu, and a librarian. Always slacks off and is about to be demoted to a 'door guardian.'

basic.name: Flower Pick
basic.description: Tosses 1 jade tile from the suit with the fewest tiles in hand to deal Quantum DMG equal to 50%-130% of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Cherry on Top!
skill.description: Deals Quantum DMG equal to 120%-312% of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Quantum DMG equal to 50%-130% of Qingque's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.'Cherry on Top!' cannot recover Skill Points.

ult.name: A Scoop of Moon
ult.description: Immediately draws 2 jade tile(s) and increases DMG by 14%-35% until the end of the current turn. This effect can stack up to 4 time(s). The turn will not end after this Skill is used.

talent.name: A Quartet? Woo-hoo!
talent.description: Deals Quantum DMG equal to 120%-240% of Qingque's ATK to all enemies, and obtain 4 jade tiles of the same suit.

technique.name: Celestial Jade
technique.description: When an ally's turn starts, Qingque randomly draws 1 tile from 3 different suits and can hold up to 4 tiles at one time.If Qingque starts her turn with 4 tiles of the same suit, she consumes all tiles to enter the 'Hidden Hand' state.While in this state, Qingque cannot use her Skill again. At the same time, Qingque's ATK increases by 36%-90%, and her Basic ATK 'Flower Pick' is enhanced, becoming 'Cherry on Top!' The 'Hidden Hand' state ends after using 'Cherry on Top!'.

name: Tingyun
description: Amicassador of the Sky-Faring Commission of the Xianzhou Luofu. She travels with business delegates, forging trade relationships and alliances with many worlds.

basic.name: Dislodged
basic.description: Tingyun deals Lightning DMG equal to 50%-130% of her ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Soothing Melody
skill.description: Grants a single ally with Benediction to increase their ATK by 25%-62.5%, up to 15%-30% of Tingyun's current ATK.When the ally with Benediction attacks, they will deal Additional Lightning DMG equal to 20%-50% of that ally's ATK for 1 time.Benediction lasts for 3 turn(s) and is only effective on the most recent receiver of Tingyun's Skill.

ult.name: Amidst the Rejoicing Clouds
ult.description: Regenerates 50 Energy for a single ally and increases the target's DMG by 20%-65% for 2 turn(s).

talent.name: Violet Sparknado
talent.description: When an enemy is attacked by Tingyun, the ally with Benediction immediately deals Additional Lightning DMG equal to 30%-75% of that ally's ATK to the same enemy.

technique.name: Gentle Breeze
technique.description: Tingyun immediately regenerates 50 Energy upon using her Technique.

name: Jing Yuan
description: One of the Xianzhou Alliance's six generals who leads the Cloud Knights of the Xianzhou Luofu. A student of the Luofu's previous Sword Champion, though not known for his martial prowess.

basic.name: Glistening Light
basic.description: Jing Yuan deals Lightning DMG equal to 50%�130% of his ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Rifting Zenith
skill.description: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50%�125% of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by 2 for the next turn.

ult.name: Lightbringer
ult.description: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 120%�240% of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by 3 for the next turn.

talent.name: Prana Extirpated
talent.description: Summons Lightning-Lord at the start of the battle. Lightning-Lord has 60 base SPD and 3 base Hits Per Action. When the Lightning-Lord takes action, its hits are considered as follow-up attacks, with each hit dealing Lightning DMG equal to 33%�82.5% of Jing Yuan's ATK to a single enemy, and enemies adjacent to it also receive Lightning DMG equal to 25% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy.The Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action can reach a max of 10. Every time Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action increases by 1, its SPD increases by 10. After the Lightning-Lord's action ends, its SPD and Hits Per Action return to their base values.When Jing Yuan is knocked down, the Lightning-Lord will disappear.When Jing Yuan is affected by Crowd Control debuff, the Lightning-Lord is unable to take action.

technique.name: Spirit Invocation
technique.description: After using Technique, at the start of the next battle, the Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action in the first turn increases by 3.

name: Sushang
description: Born on the Xianzhou Yaoqing, sent to the Cloud Knights of the Luofu for military training. She wields her family sword, a gift from her mother, and longs for the future she will go on to write.

basic.name: Cloudfencer Art: Starshine
basic.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to 50%-130% of Sushang's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Cloudfencer Art: Mountainfall
skill.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to 105%-262.5 of Sushang's ATK to a single enemy. In addition, there is a 33% chance to trigger Sword Stance on the final hit, dealing Additional Physical DMG equal to 50%-125% of Sushang's ATK to the enemy.If the enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, Sword Stance is guaranteed to trigger.

ult.name: Shape of Taixu: Dawn Herald
ult.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to 192%-384% of Sushang's ATK to a single enemy and immediately Advances her action forward by 100%. In addition, Sushang's ATK increases by 18%-36% and using her Skill has 2 extra chances to trigger Sword Stance for 2 turn(s).Sword Stance triggered from the extra chances deals 50% of the original DMG.

talent.name: Dancing Blade
talent.description: When an enemy has their Weakness Broken on the field, Sushang's SPD increases by 15%-22.5% for 2 turn(s).

technique.name: Cloudfencer Art: Warcry
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Sushang deals Physical DMG equal to 80% of her ATK to all enemies.

name: Yanqing
description: General Jing Yuan's retainer. A gifted swordsman who hasn't even come of age. No one can best him when Yanqing holds a sword in hand.

basic.name: Frost Thorn
basic.description: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50%-130% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Darting Ironthorn
skill.description: Deals Ice DMG equal to 110%-275% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy and activates Soulsteel Sync for 1 turn.

ult.name: Amidst the Raining Bliss
ult.description: Increases Yanqing's CRIT Rate by 60%. When Soulsteel Sync is active, increases Yanqing's CRIT DMG by an extra 30%-60%. This buff lasts for one turn. Afterwards, deals Ice DMG equal to 210%-420% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.

talent.name: One With the Sword
talent.description: When Soulsteel Sync is active, Yanqing is less likely to be attacked by enemies. Yanqing's CRIT Rate increases by 15%-22.5% and his CRIT DMG increases by 15%-37.5%. After Yanqing attacks an enemy, there is a 50%-65% fixed chance to perform a follow-up attack, dealing Ice DMG equal to 25%-62.5% of Yanqing's ATK to the enemy, which has a 65% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn.The Frozen target cannot take action and receives Additional Ice DMG equal to 25%-62.5% of Yanqing's ATK at the beginning of each turn.When Yanqing receives DMG, the Soulsteel Sync effect will disappear.

technique.name: The One True Sword
technique.description: After using his Technique, at the start of the next battle, Yanqing deals 30% more DMG for 2 turn(s) to enemies whose current HP is 50% or higher.

name: Bailu
description: The High Elder of the Vidyadhara, who is also known as the 'Healer Lady' on the Luofu. She uses her unique medical science and the medical treatment that can only be provided by the Vidyadhara dragon race to save lives.

basic.name: Diagnostic Kick
basic.description: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50%-130% of Bailu's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Singing Among Clouds
skill.description: Heals a single ally for 7.8%-13.65% of Bailu's Max HP plus 78-399.75. Bailu then heals random allies 2 time(s). After each healing, HP restored from the next healing is reduced by 15%.

ult.name: Felicitous Thunderleap
ult.description: Heals all allies for 9%-15.75% of Bailu's Max HP plus 90-461.25. Bailu applies Invigoration to allies that are not already Invigorated. For those already Invigorated, Bailu extends the duration of their Invigoration by 1 turn. The effect of Invigoration can last for 2 turn(s). This effect cannot stack.

talent.name: Gourdful of Elixir
talent.description: After an ally with Invigoration is hit, restores the ally's HP for 3.6%-6.3% of Bailu's Max HP plus 36-184.5. This effect can trigger 2 time(s). When an ally receives a killing blow, they will not be knocked down. Bailu immediately heals the ally for 12%-21% of Bailu's Max HP plus 120-615 HP. This effect can be triggered 1 time per battle.

technique.name: Saunter in the Rain
technique.description: After using Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies are granted Invigoration for 2 turn(s).

name: Silver Wolf
description: The universe is just another game to this super hacker. No matter how thorny the defense system, Silver Wolf can crack it with ease. Her hacking battle with Screwllum of the Genius Society has become stuff of legends in the hacking world. How many more levels are there to beat in the universe? Silver Wolf looks forward to finding out.

basic.name: System Warning
basic.description: Deals Quantum DMG equal to 50%-130% of Silver Wolf's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Allow Changes?
skill.description: There is a 75%-90% base chance to add 1 Weakness of an on-field ally's Type to the target enemy. This also reduces the enemy's DMG RES to that Weakness Type by 20% for 2 turn(s). If the enemy already has that Type Weakness, the effect of DMG RES reduction to that Weakness Type will not be triggered. Each enemy can only have 1 Weakness implanted by Silver Wolf. When Silver Wolf implants another Weakness to the target, only the most recent implanted Weakness will be kept. In addition, there is a 100% base chance to further reduce the All-Type RES of the enemy by 7.5%-11.25% for 2 turn(s). Deals Quantum DMG equal to 98%-245% of Silver Wolf's ATK to this enemy.

ult.name: User Banned
ult.description: There's a 85%-107.5% base chance to decrease the target enemy's DEF by 36%-49.5% for 3 turn(s). And at the same time, deals Quantum DMG equal to 228%-456% of Silver Wolf's ATK to the target enemy.

talent.name: Awaiting System Response...
talent.description: Silver Wolf can create three types of Bugs: reduce ATK by 5%-12.5%, reduce DEF by 4%-10%, and reduce SPD by 3%-7.5%. Every time Silver Wolf attacks, she has a 60%-78% base chance to implant a random Bug that lasts for 3 turn(s) in the enemy target.

technique.name: Force Quit Program
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Quantum DMG equal to 80% of Silver Wolf's ATK to all enemies, and ignores Weakness Types and reduces Toughness from all enemies. Enemies with their Weakness Broken in this way will trigger the Quantum Weakness Break effect.

name: Luocha
description: Carrying a coffin wherever he goes, he is a foreign trader who came from beyond the stellar seas. He also has excellent medical skills.

basic.name: Thorns of the Abyss
basic.description: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 50%-130% of Luocha's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Prayer of Abyss Flower
skill.description: After using his Skill, Luocha immediately restores the target ally's HP equal to 40%-70% of Luocha's ATK plus 200-1025. Meanwhile, Luocha gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower. When any ally's HP percentage drops to 50% or lower, an effect equivalent to Luocha's Skill will immediately be triggered and applied to this ally for one time (without consuming Skill Points). This effect can be triggered again after 2 turn(s).

ult.name: Death Wish
ult.description: Removes 1 buff(s) from all enemies and deals all enemies Imaginary DMG equal to 120%-240% of Luocha's ATK. At the same time, Luocha gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower.

talent.name: Cycle of Life
talent.description: When Abyss Flower reaches 2 stacks, Luocha consumes all stacks of Abyss Flower to deploy a Field against the enemy. When any enemy in the Field is attacked by an ally, the attacking ally's HP is immediately restored by an amount equal to 12%-21% of Luocha's ATK plus 60-308. The Field's effect lasts for 2 turns. When Luocha is knocked down, the Field will be dispelled.

technique.name: Mercy of a Fool
technique.description: After the Technique is used, the Talent will be immediately triggered at the start of the next battle.

name: Yukong
description: Head of the Sky-Faring Commission on the Xianzhou Luofu. Yukong was a seasoned pilot and a deadshot. Since heading up the commission, she's been buried under mountains of paperwork.

basic.name: Arrowslinger
basic.description: Deals 50%-130% of Yukong's ATK as Imaginary DMG to a target enemy.

skill.name: Emboldening Salvo
skill.description: Obtains 2 stack(s) of "Roaring Bowstrings" (to a maximum of 2 stacks). When "Roaring Bowstrings" is active, the ATK of all allies increases by 40%-100%, and every time an ally's turn ends, Yukong loses 1 stack of "Roaring Bowstrings." When it's the turn where Yukong gains "Roaring Bowstrings" by using Skill, "Roaring Bowstrings" will not be removed.

ult.name: Diving Kestrel
ult.description: If "Roaring Bowstrings" is active on Yukong when her Ultimate is used, additionally increases all allies' CRIT Rate by 21%-31.5% and CRIT DMG by 39%-78%. At the same time, deals Imaginary DMG equal to 228%-456% of Yukong's ATK to a single enemy.

talent.name: Seven Layers, One Arrow
talent.description: Basic ATK additionally deals Imaginary DMG equal to 40%-100% of Yukong's ATK, and increases the Toughness-Reducing DMG of this attack by 100%. This effect can be triggered again in 1 turn(s).

technique.name: Chasing the Wind
technique.description: After using her Technique, Yukong enters Sprint mode for 20 seconds. In Sprint mode, her Movement SPD increases by 35%, and Yukong gains 2 stack(s) of "Roaring Bowstrings" when she enters battle by attacking enemies.

basic.name: Ice-Breaking Light
basic.description: Deals Fire DMG equal to 50%-130% of Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and gains 1 stack of Magma Will.

basic2.name: Ice-Breaking Light
basic2.description: Consumes 4 stacks of Magma Will to enhance Basic ATK, dealing Fire DMG equal to 90%-168.75% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and Fire DMG to equal to 36%-67.5% of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

skill.name: Ever-Burning Amber
skill.description: Increases the Trailblazer's DMG Reduction by 40%-55% and gains 1 stack of Magma Will, with a 100% base chance to Taunt all enemies for 1 turn(s).

ult.name: War-Flaming Lance
ult.description: Deals Fire DMG equal to 50%-125% of the Trailblazer's ATK plus 75%-187.5% of the Trailblazer's DEF to all enemies. The next Basic ATK will be automatically enhanced and does not cost Magma Will.

talent.name: Treasure of the Architects
talent.description: Each time the Trailblazer is hit, they gain 1 stack of Magma Will for a max of 8 stack(s). When Magma Will has no fewer than 4 stacks, the Trailblazer's Basic ATK becomes enhanced, dealing DMG to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it. When the Trailblazer uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, apply a Shield to all allies that absorbs DMG equal to 4%-7% of the Trailblazer's DEF plus 20-102.5. The Shield lasts for 2 turn(s).

technique.name: Call of the Guardian
technique.description: After using Technique, at the start of the next battle, gains a Shield that absorbs DMG equal to 30% of the Trailblazer's DEF plus 384 for 1 turn(s).

name: Blade
description: A swordsman who abandoned his body to become a blade. Birth name unknown. He pledges loyalty to "Destiny's Slave," and possesses a terrifying self-healing ability. Blade wields an ancient sword riddled with cracks, just like his body and his mind.

basic.name: Shard Sword
basic.description: Deals 50%-130% of Blade's ATK as Wind DMG to a target enemy.

basic2.name: Forest of Swords
basic2.description: Consumes HP equal to 10% of Blade's Max HP and deals Wind DMG equal to the sum of 20%-52% of his ATK and 50%-130% of his Max HP to a single enemy. In addition, deals Wind DMG equal to the sum of 8%-21% of Blade's ATK and 20%-52% of his Max HP to adjacent targets. If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when using Forest of Swords. Forest of Swords cannot regenerate Skill Points.

skill.name: Hellscape
skill.description: Consumes HP equal to 30% of Blade's Max HP to enter the Hellscape state. When Hellscape is active, his Skill cannot be used, his DMG dealt increases by 12%-54%, and his Basic ATK Shard Sword is enhanced to Forest of Swords for 3 turn(s). If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when he uses his Skill. This Skill does not regenerate Energy. Using this Skill does not end the current turn.

ult.name: Death Sentence
ult.description: Sets Blade's current HP to 50% of his Max HP and deals Wind DMG to a single enemy equal to the sum of 24%-48% of his ATK, 60%-120% of his Max HP, and 60%-120% of the tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle. At the same time, deals Wind DMG to adjacent targets equal to the sum of 9.6%-19.2% of his ATK, 24%-48% of his Max HP, and 24%-48% of the tally of his HP loss in the current battle. The tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle is capped at 90% of his Max HP. This value will be reset and re-accumulated after his Ultimate has been used.

talent.name: Shuhu's Gift
talent.description: When Blade sustains DMG or consumes his HP, he gains 1 stack of Charge, stacking up to 5 times. A max of 1 Charge stack can be gained every time he is attacked. When Charge stack reaches maximum, immediately launches a follow-up attack on all enemies, dealing Wind DMG equal to 22%-55% of Blade's ATK plus 55%-138% of his Max HP. At the same time, restores Blade's HP by 25% of his Max HP. After the follow-up attack, all Charges are consumed.

technique.name: Karma Wind
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering combat, consumes 20% of Blade's Max HP while dealing Wind DMG equal to 40% of his Max HP to all enemies. If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when this Technique is used.

name: Kafka
description: A member of the Stellaron Hunters. A dashing, collected, and professional beauty. Her hobby is shopping for and organizing her collection of coats.

basic.name: Midnight Tumult
basic.description: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50%-130% of Kafka's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Caressing Moonlight
skill.description: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 80%-200% of Kafka's ATK to a target enemy and Lightning DMG equal to 30%-75% of Kafka's ATK to enemies adjacent to it. If the target enemy is currently receiving DoT, all DoTs currently placed on that enemy immediately produce DMG equal to 60%-83% of their original DMG.

ult.name: Twilight Trill
ult.description: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 48%-96% of Kafka's ATK to all enemies, with a 100% base chance for enemies hit to become Shocked and immediately take DMG from their current Shock state, equal to 80%-110% of its original DMG. Shock lasts for 2 turn(s). While Shocked, enemies receive Lightning DoT equal to 116%-361% of Kafka's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

talent.name: Gentle but Cruel
talent.description: After an ally of Kafka's uses Basic ATK on an enemy target, Kafka immediately launches 1 follow-up attack and deals Lightning DMG equal to 42%-189% of her ATK to that target, with a 100% base chance to inflict Shock equivalent to that applied by her Ultimate to the attacked enemy target for 2 turns. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per turn.

technique.name: Mercy Is Not Forgiveness
technique.description: Immediately attacks all enemies within a set range. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to 50% of Kafka's ATK to all enemies, with a 100% base chance to inflict Shock equivalent to that applied by her Ultimate on every enemy target for 2 turn(s).

name: Luka
description: The boxing champion in Belobog's Underworld, and one of Wildfire's most capable fighters. The consecutive reigning champion of the Fight Club, whose enthusiasm inspires children of the Underworld to dream big.

basic.name: Direct Punch
basic.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to 50%-130% of Luka's ATK to a single enemy.

basic2.name: Sky-Shatter Fist
basic2.description: Consumes 2 stacks of Fighting Will. First, uses Direct Punch to deal 3 hits, with each hit dealing Physical DMG equal to 10%-26% of Luka's ATK to a single enemy target. Then, uses Rising Uppercut to deal 1 hit, dealing Physical DMG equal to 40%-104% of Luka's ATK to the single enemy target.

skill.name: Lacerating Fist
skill.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to 60%-150% of Luka's ATK to a single enemy target. In addition, there is a 100% base chance to inflict Bleed on them, lasting for 3 turn(s). While Bleeding, the enemy will take 24% of their Max HP as Physical DoT at the start of each turn. This DMG will not exceed more than 130%-422% of Luka's ATK.

ult.name: Coup de Grâce
ult.description: Receives 2 stack(s) of Fighting Will, with a 100% base chance to increase a single enemy target's DMG received by 12%-24% for 3 turn(s). Then, deals Physical DMG equal to 198%-396% of Luka's ATK to the target.

talent.name: Flying Sparks
talent.description: After Luka uses his Basic ATK "Direct Punch" or Skill "Lacerating Fist," he receives 1 stack(s) of Fighting Will, up to 4 stacks. When he has 2 or more stacks of Fighting Will, his Basic ATK "Direct Punch" is enhanced to "Sky-Shatter Fist." After his Enhanced Basic ATK's "Rising Uppercut" hits a Bleeding enemy target, the Bleed status will immediately deal DMG for 1 time equal to 68%-94% of the original DMG to the target. At the start of battle, Luka will possess 1 stack of Fighting Will.

technique.name: Anticipator
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Luka deals Physical DMG equal to 50% of his ATK to a random single enemy with a 100% base chance to inflict his Skill's Bleed effect on the target. Then, Luka gains 1 additional stack of Fighting Will.

name: Fu Xuan
description: The head of the Xianzhou Luofu's Divination Commission. A confident and blunt sage. Using her third eye and the Matrix of Prescience, Fu Xuan calculates the Xianzhou's route and predicts the fortune of future events. She firmly believes that everything she does is the "best solution" for the situation. Fu Xuan is waiting for the general's promised "abdication." However, that day still seems... very far away.

name: Imbibitor Lunae
description: Dan Heng's true form from his Vidyadhara lineage carries the residual power left behind by his past incarnation, the Imbibitor Lunae. Upon accepting the majestic horns atop his crown, he must accept all the merits and faults attributed to that sinner.

basic.name: Beneficent Lotus
basic.description: Uses a 2-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 50%-130% of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target.

basic2.name: Transcendence
basic2.description: Uses a 3-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 130%-338% of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target.

basic3.name: Divine Spear
basic3.description: Uses a 5-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 190%-494% of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target. From the fourth hit onward, simultaneously deals Imaginary DMG equal to 30%-78% of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to adjacent targets.

basic4.name: Fulgurant Leap
basic4.description: Uses a 7-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 250%-650% of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target. From the fourth hit onward, simultaneously deal Imaginary DMG equal to 90%-234% of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to adjacent targets.

skill.name: Dracore Libre
skill.description:
Enhances Basic ATK. Enhancements may be applied up to 3 times consecutively. Using this ability does not consume Skill Points and is not considered as using a Skill. 
Enhanced once, Beneficent Lotus becomes Transcendence. Enhanced twice, Beneficent Lotus becomes Divine Spear. Enhanced thrice, Beneficent Lotus becomes Fulgurant Leap. 
When using Divine Spear or Fulgurant Leap, starting from the fourth hit, 1 stack of Outroar is gained before every hit. Each stack of Outroar increases Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's CRIT DMG by 6%-15%, for a max of 4 stacks. These stacks last until the end of his turn.

ult.name: Azure's Aqua Ablutes All
ult.description: Uses a 3-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 180%-360% of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target. At the same time, deals Imaginary DMG equal to 84%-168% of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to adjacent targets. Then, obtains 2 Squama Sacrosancta. It's possible to hold up to 3 Squama Sacrosancta, which can be used to offset the consumption of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's skill points. Consuming Squama Sacrosancta is considered equivalent to consuming skill points.

talent.name: Righteous Heart
talent.description: After each hit dealt during an attack, Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae gains 1 stack of Righteous Heart, increasing his DMG by 5%-12.5%. This effect can stack up to 6 time(s), lasting until the end of his turn.

technique.name: Heaven-Quelling Prismadrakon
technique.description: After using his Technique, Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae enters the Leaping Dragon state for 20 seconds. While in the Leaping Dragon state, using his attack enables him to move forward rapidly for a set distance, attacking all enemies he touches and blocking all incoming attacks. After entering combat via attacking enemies in the Leaping Dragon state, Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae deals Imaginary DMG equal to 120% of his ATK to all enemies, and gains 1 Squama Sacrosancta.
